cyclone.name: HERMINE
cyclone.current_location: about 395 miles SSW of Apalachicola, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: drifting north-northeast today and then accelerating northeast toward Florida’s Big Bend and the southeast U.S. coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: north-west Florida Big Bend (near Indian Pass/Apalachicola)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from Anclote River to Indian Pass, FL; Tropical Storm Watch from Marineland FL to Altamaha Sound GA
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Anclote River to the Walton/Bay County line, FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Primary impacts expected along Florida’s Gulf coast (Aripeka to Indian Pass) then coastal GA-NC
weather_observation.wind: Only a very small (≤3%) chance of tropical-storm-force winds; otherwise breezy with occasional squalls possible.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected at Plaquemines Parish; surge focus is along Florida Big Bend.
weather_observation.rainfall: Isolated outer-band showers; rainfall totals likely less than 2 inches.
weather_observation.other_hazards: None anticipated that would significantly disrupt operations at the port.
